name: N NEVO RHINO Hydration Bladder 2L-3L with Bladder Insulator, Water Bladder for Hiking Backpack, Leakproof Water Pouch, BPA-Free Water Reservoir Hydration Pack for Hiking Running Camping Cycling Skiing
short_description: 【Comprehensive Insulation Combination】N NEVO RHINO water reservoir set includes a 2L water bladder, an insulated sleeve, an insulated drink tube & two cleaning brushes. The insulation bag is equipped with an aluminium foil liner on both the front & back sides, keeping your water fresh for 5-7 hours. Plus an insulated hose cover, this insulation combination keeps water flowing during sub-zero activities while also prevents overheating and blocks UV rays by direct sunlight in summer

【Ultra Leakproof & Durable Design】Our 2L hydration bladder is made of high quality food grade material, BPA-free, it won't leave a bad taste in your drink. This material possesses excellent temperature resistance, maintaining its softness and toughness even in freezing weather or scorching summer, without cracking. This hiking water bladder crafted with advanced double-sealing technology ensures zero leakage during intense outdoor sports

【Functional reinforced baffle design】The interior of our hydration bladder features a baffle design in the middle, which can minimize the shaking of water during running or cycling. It can prevent the inner wall from fully adhering, ensuring that water can flow smoothly to the straw, achieving continuous and stable drinking in outdoor activities

【Large Opening for Easy Cleaning】Easy slide-seal with wide top large opening, seals watertight and provides wide access for easy filling and pouring of ice cubes or water. The hydration pack bladder is convenient to clean the smooth inner liner by hand or with a brush, and dry thoroughly, keeping your insulated water bladder fresh and ready for your next adventure

【Widely Application】Combination of water bladder and insulated bag can greatly enhance the outdoor experience for runners, hikers, skier, and outdoor adventurers who have a need to keep their water temperature. It is compatible with most running hydration vests and hiking hydration backpacks available on the market. The water pouch is ideal for hiking, running, camping, cycling, skiing and more

name: N NEVO RHINO Water Bladder 1.5L-2 Liter, BPA -Free Hydration Bladder for Hiking Backpack Running Vest, Leak - Proof Water Reservoir Storage Bag for Camping & Outdoor Adventures
short_description: 【Running-Specific Hydration Bladder】Why is it designed specifically for running? This hydration bladder is equipped with double reinforced baffles inside to prevent violent water sloshing during running and eliminate any discomfort, allowing you to maintain a steady pace during competitions

【Ideal Hydration Bladder for Running Vests】Constructed from high-quality food-grade materials with a 1.5L capacity, it is BPA-free and ensures no unpleasant aftertaste in your water. It features an innovative high-flow bite valve that increases water flow rate by 30%, and comes with a detachable drinking tube and a dust cover (Pull the bite valve out to unlock and drink; push it in to stop water flow.)

【360° Leak-Proof Design】Our production team conducts rigorous and frequent tests on every batch of hydration bladders. Each bladder remains perfectly intact after 72 consecutive hours of intensive vibration testing. The double-sealing technology along the bladder edges withstands heavy squeezing. Our mission is to provide you with sufficient water replenishment without any worries

【Large Opening with Slide Closure】Featuring a wide opening of 2.6 inches / 7 cm, it allows for quick filling with ice cubes and drinking water. The smooth inner lining is easy to clean either by hand or with a cleaning brush. We recommend cleaning and soaking the bladder in a mixture of baking soda and warm water for 30 minutes before first use

【Universal Replacement Hydration Bladder】This reservoir is compatible with most running hydration vests and hiking hydration vests available on the market. The package comes with a set of cleaning brushes, 2 tube clips, 1 drying clip for the bladder, and a sun protection neck gaiter, delivering an ultimate sports experience for you

【After sale】If you have any questions about our water bladders, please reach out to us, we will reply within 24 hrs. (We provide replacement services for quality problems within 1 year and lifetime customer service)
